Àtụ:Infobox film
Onye na-ehi ura (nke a tọhapụrụ na Philippines dị ka mmuo ojoo no n'ulo) bụ ihe nkiri egwu nke 1995 nke Turi Meyer duziri, nke Al Septien na Meyer dere, nke Michael Harris, Jay Underwood, Kathryn Morris, na Michael D
Afọ iri na asaa mgbe e gbusịrị mmadụ niile ma e wezụga otu onye n'ime ezinụlọ, "Sandman" (Michael Harris) na-echere ogbugbu
Tupu e gbuo ya, ndị na-elekọta ụlọ mkpọrọ kwere ka onye ozi (Michael D
Minista ahụ bụ onye ụkọchukwu voodoo na onye ya na onye mkpọrọ ahụ jikọrọ aka, nke ndị na-elekọta ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ amaghị
A na-etinye hex na Sandman, nke mere na mgbe ogbugbu ya gwụchara, mkpụrụ obi ya nwere ike ịga n'ahụ ọhụrụ e ji ájá mee, mana ndị ikwu ọbara ya niile ga-anwụ
Sandman na-akpa nkata igbu nwa okorobịa aha ya bụ Griffin (Jay Underwood), onye bụ obere nwanne ya nwoke, na mgbakwunye, onye lanarịrị mmegbu nke nna ha
Griffin lanarịrị mgbalị igbu ọchụ ahụ, mana nne na nna nkuchi ya emeghị ya
A na-amụ Sandman ọzọ, mgbe e gburu ya, iji nwee ohere ịnwale ọzọ.
Nkwekọrịta mba ụwa n'etiti United Kingdom na United States
Nturundu prism  malitere tupu mmepụta nke ihe nkiri ahụ na 1994.
A tọhapụrụ onye na-ehi ura kpọmkwem na vidiyo na 1995
Na Philippines, e wepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ n'ụlọ ihe nkiri dị ka mmuo ojoo no n'ulo na Eprel 27, 1995.
Usoro onyonyo nyere ya kpakpando 2/5 wee dee, "onye na-ehi ura n'otu oge na-egosi ịdị nkọ na nkụda mmụọ nke onye nduzi ya n'enweghị ike ịgbanwe ihe nkiri ntị nke ezì
